column4: hey could  anyone maybe help me? my display went black after 20 minutes like in screensaver mode. but i deactivated my screensaver in XFCE and it is pretty annoying to move the mouse every time i watch movie. :-(
ps -A | grep xscreensaver   is it still running?
if so run xscreensaver-demo and goto advanced and edit the power savings settings or just pkill screensaver
